file_content.text: T7 = excited to leave Tython // T7 = happy to have Jedi partner
We make a good team, Teeseven.
I like working with you, too.
I didn't realize you were so eager to leave the Jedi Academy
You didn't like Tython?
Tython = many Jedi // Tython = well protected
Galaxy = dangerous place // Galaxy = needs Jedi + T7
Let's get one thing clear: I'm your owner. You do what I say. Understand?
We're not partners.
Jedi = understood
T7 = many skills // T7 = eager to help
I get the feeling there's tough times ahead. I'm glad you're up for the challenge.
I like your enthusiasm.
Don't worry, Teeseven. We'll find plenty of ways for you to help out.
You'll get your chance.
The last thing I need is a droid that gets so worked up it fries its circuits.
Just settle down.
T7 = sturdy construction // Circuits = well insulated
Jedi + T7 = start as soon as possible // Jedi + T7 = save the galaxy
You wanted to talk to me, Teeseven?
SIS surveillance = cleared Senator Sydia's name // Imperial traitor = Sydia's husband // Husband = arrested this morning
None of this would have been possible without all the work you did to uncover the truth.
Nice job, T7.
T7 = following Jedi example // Jedi = inspires T7
If you can't trust the person closest to you, who can you trust?
That's the ultimate betrayal.
There's no way her husband was behind this without her knowledge.
She had to suspect something.
Love = blindness // Jedi Council = wise to limit emotional attachments
Senator Sydia = betrayed by her partner // T7 = promises never to betray Jedi
Jedi = T7 favorite partner // Jedi = bravest, smartest, strongest partner ever!
I could say the same about you, Teeseven. That's why we're such a good team.
The feeling's mutual.
I appreciate the compliments, but I'm not perfect. Believing I am is the first step towards the dark side.
A Jedi must stay humble.
Jedi = wise // T7 = learns from Jedi // T7 = stay with Jedi forever!
Nice to see someone appreciates me.
You got that right.
Jedi + T7 = greatest heroes ever // T7 = stay with Jedi forever!
Don't worry, little buddy - wherever I go, you'll be at my side.
I couldn't agree more.
You've got a long and interesting history, Teeseven. Do you really think you'll be satisfied staying with me from now on?
Are you sure about this?
Jedi = saving galaxy // Jedi = true hero // Jedi = T7 perfect partner
I'm not a droid, Teeseven. I'm going to grow old and become one with the Force. Then you'll have to find someone else.
I won't live forever.
T7 = sad // T7 = focus on present // T7 + Jedi = partners for entire Jedi life
T7 = not just help Jedi // T7 = teach Jedi friends + followers + padawans // T7 = help others be heroes like Jedi!
It's good to know my legacy will live on after I'm gone.
Galaxy = always needs heroes // T7 = ready for next mission
You have something for me?
T7 = identified bounty hunter employer // Payment = authorized by office of Republic Senator // Senator = Verre Sydia
T7 = confused // Senator Sydia = strong opponent of Empire // Sydia = not logical traitor
If the Senator's guilty, I don't want to give her a chance to destroy the evidence.
Alert the authorities. Now.
If the Senator is being set up, I don't want to ruin her reputation. This needs to be handled discreetly.
Maybe she's being framed.
Being an outspoken opponent of the Empire is the perfect cover for an Imperial spy.
It's always who you least suspect.
T7 = alert Republic SIS // SIS surveillance = find truth about Senator Sydia
T7 = alert Jedi when SIS surveillance complete
What have you got for me?
T7 = back traced bounty hunter payment // Payment = channeled through classified Senate accounts
Only a few dozen Senators have access to those accounts. One of them must be an Imperial spy.
This is bigger than I thought.
That's quite an accusation. You need to be sure about this. Someone could be planting a false trail.
This could be a set up.
T7 = verified results multiple times // Possibility of error = less than one percent
I can't accuse the entire Senate of betraying the Republic. I need to know exactly who is behind this.
I need a name.
T7 = still looking for specific name // Senate accounts = buried in red tape
T7 = shocked // Senators = shouldn't betray Republic
Until we find out who hired the bounty hunter - and why - we can't be sure of anything.
Don't jump to conclusions.
Jedi = right // T7 + Jedi = wait for all evidence // Most Senators = loyal to Republic // T7 = worked for Senator long ago
A Senator can be just as greedy and ruthless as anyone else, Teeseven.
You're too trusting.
The Senate is made up of greedy, power-hungry opportunists.
Politicians have no loyalty.
Jedi = too critical // Most Senators = loyal to Republic // T7 = worked for Senator long ago
This casts a bad light on the entire Senate. Until we know who's responsible, I don't want this to leak out.
We have to keep this quiet.
Jedi = wise // Broad accusations = breed suspicion // Senate = needs trust to function
I never pictured you as a politician.
You worked for a Senator?
T7 = special assistant to Senator Oodora // Senator Oodora = Manaan representative // T7 = helped Senator Oodora for 20 years
T7 = started as Senate legislation analyst // Senator = promoted T7 after first year
T7 = campaign manager + speech writer
I never realized you had so many varied skills, Teeseven.
You truly are amazing.
T7 = multi-functional // T7 = joined Jedi Master Ven Zallow when Senator retired
How did that work out?
You wrote his speeches?
Senator Oodora = served 4 consecutive terms // // T7 = joined Jedi Master Ven Zallow when Senator retired
He couldn't have lasted long with you writing his speeches.
Please tell me you're joking.
Jedi = underestimating T7 // Senator Oodora = served 4 consecutive terms // T7 = joined Master Ven Zallow when Senator retired
We can't ignore a traitor in the Senate. We must advise the authorities.
We have to tell someone.
Jedi = acting rashly // Broad accusations = breed suspicion // Senate = needs trust to function
T7 = continue analysis // T7 = identify Senator behind bounty hunter
T7 = alert Jedi when investigation complete
You wanted to see me?
Shafu's killer = identified // T7 = tracking financial records to find who hired bounty hunter // Estimated completion = uncertain
We're getting closer to finding out who's behind this. Keep it up.
Good work.
Tell me what you found out.
Who was the assassin?
Bounty hunter = Terrin Sandafar // Terrin = born on Alderaan // Terrin = served in Republic army
Terrin = deserted after first year // Terrin = freelance mercenary
Anyone who would abandon their comrades-in-arms is a coward.
There's no honor in that.
Being a mercenary pays a lot better than being a soldier.
Guess she wanted her payday.
Republic soldiers = heroes // Bounty hunters = scum
Everyone else involved with this case seems to be out of the picture.
Is she dead, too?
Terrin's ship = exploded over Alderaan // Explosion = ruled accidental
A taste of her own medicine. Guess her employer didn't trust her to keep quiet.
You never seem to know how long it's going to take to get what we need.
I'm tired of hearing that.
Bounty hunter = covered tracks well // Jedi = be patient // T7 = working hard
T7 = analyzing implications of Eckhorn's list // Spies on list = maybe helped Empire attack Coruscant
Attack = maybe prevented if names exposed // List = maybe saved Master Zallow
Regrets won't bring Master Zallow back. He's gone. You just have to accept it.
We can't change the past.
Jedi = wise // T7 = focus on present
You can't blame yourself for what happened to your Master, Teeseven.
His death wasn't your fault.
Master Zallow = good man // T7 = let Master Zallow down
You didn't let him down. He gave his life to protect the Republic. Now you're carrying on his work. He'd be proud of you.
Jedi = wise // Master Zallow + T7 = partners then // Jedi + T7 = partners now // Jedi = needs T7 full attention
I don't need you wallowing about a former Master's death. You work for me now.
He's dead. Let it go.
Jedi = tough but fair // Jedi = needs T7 // T7 = focus on current mission
T7 + Jedi = save galaxy! // T7 + Jedi = best heroes ever!
The Empire doesn't stand a chance against the likes of us.
That's the spirit.
We've still got a lot of work ahead of us.
Don't get too excited.
Quit wasting time and figure out who hired that bounty hunter.
Just get back to work.
T7 = continue tracing financial records // T7 = identify who paid bounty hunter // T7 = alert Jedi when finished
T7 = success // Shafu's report = recompiled
What's it say?
Don't keep me in suspense.
I knew you'd come through, Teeseven.
Nice work
I guess even a blind gizka finds a zella nut once in a while.
Took you long enough.
T7 = inorganic // T7 = doesn't eat nuts
You also don't have a sense of humor, I see. Just tell me what you found.
Shafu = intercepted message from Republic bureaucrat // Bureaucrat = human named Eckhorn // Eckhorn = member of House Baliss on Alderaan
Eckhorn = Imperial spy // Eckhorn = compiled list of Imperial sympathizers inside Republic // Eckhorn = hid list inside Baliss estate
If we have Imperial sympathizers inside the Republic, we need to know who they are. Time to pay House Baliss a visit.
Let's go get that list.
Any idea if this Imperial Spy is still active?
Where's Eckhorn now?
Eckhorn's an Imperial spy. Someone needs to take him out.
I need to kill this traitor.
Eckhorn = died 20 years ago // Ship = exploded above Alderaan // Explosion = ruled accidental
I'm sensing a pattern here, T7.
Shafu was killed the same way!
He probably tried to blackmail the Imperials. Threatened to turn his list over to the Republic. So they killed him.
I bet Eckhorn got greedy.
Jedi = wise // Shafu = murdered
All the leads in this case have gone cold. It's time to give up.
Sounds like a dead end.
T7 = never give up!
Shafu + Eckhorn = both blown up // T7 = studying criminal database // T7 = search for bounty hunter using similar methods
T7 = alert Jedi if bounty hunter identified
You wanted to see me?
T7 = no progress // Rebuilding Shafu's report = too complicated // T7 = failure
Just stick with it, you'll figure it out.
Don't give up.
Shafu knew how valuable this information was. He went to extreme lengths to protect it. It's no wonder you're struggling.
You're not a failure.
I get results. I expect the same from my crew. Failure is not an option. Understood?
I don't want excuses.
T7 = failed before // Strategic Intelligence Service = assigned T7 special mission // Mission = incomplete
What was your mission?
Tell me what happened.
You never told me you were a spy for the Republic.
When did you work for the SIS?
SIS + T7 = 20 years ago // T7 = only worked one mission
If the SIS needed someone for a critical mission, they should have sent a real agent instead of a glorified trash can.
Sending you was stupid.
SIS = compromised // T7 = outside agent
SIS = discovered assassination plot // Muun ambassador = target of GenoHaradan // T7 = sent undercover to protect ambassador
The GenoHaradan are the galaxy's deadliest assassins. How could the SIS expect you to stop one of their agents?
That's a dangerous mission.
Who or what are the GenoHaradan?
The GenoHaradan?
GenoHaradan = secret society of assassins // Official Republic policy = GenoHaradan only legend // T7 = verified GenoHaradan exist
Did you get any of that Muun's blood on you when the GenoHaradan blew him away?
Let me guess--he died.
T7 = detected assassin in crowd // T7 = discharged stun bolt // Assassin = dropped blaster and escaped in crowd
Assassin = never captured // Ambassador = scared // Ambassador = resigned from post // T7 = failure
The ambassador may have resigned, but you saved his life. You're a hero, Teeseven.
You didn't fail.
Jedi = right // Ambassador = lived long, healthy life
Was this the only attempt on the Ambassador's life?
Did they ever try again?
Further attempts = unnecessary // Ambassador = no longer in office // Resignation = assassination
They're not the same thing.
There's nothing we can do about the past, Teeseven. Focus on what we're doing now.
You have to let this go.
T7 = grateful // Galaxy = needs T7 // Jedi + T7 = unstoppable team!
Your previous missions mean nothing to me--I only care about here and now. So quit whining and do your job!
I don't care about your past.
Jedi = right // Past = over // T7 = focus on current mission
You had a chance to capture a GenoHaradan and you let him get away. You better not ever let me down like that.
You really blew it.
Jedi = right // Failure = unacceptable // T7 = won't let Jedi down
T7 = continue rebuilding Shafu's report // T7 = contact Jedi when done
You wanted to talk?
T7 = trying to rebuild Shafu's report // Data files = badly corrupted // Estimated completion = uncertain
T7 = confession // T7 = dishonest with Jedi
I trust you, Teeseven. Whatever it is, it can't be that bad.
I'm sure it's nothing.
Come clean, Teeseven. I need to know what's going on.
Dishonest? About what?
If I can't trust you I may have to get your memory wiped.
This is a serious problem.
Memory wipe = not necessary // T7 = tell Jedi everything
T7 = worked with Shafu before Master Zallow // T7 = unaware Shafu was slaver
Master Zallow = convinced Shafu to reform // Shafu = gave T7 to Master Zallow
Don't worry about it, little fella. I thought you had some dark, terrible secret.
That's not a big deal.
T7 = relieved // T7 = glad Jedi knows truth
Why did you try to hide your relationship with Shafu?
Why didn't you tell me?
You worked for a slaver and had no idea what he was up to? Come on.
That's pretty hard to believe.
T7 = navigator on ship // T7 = never entered cargo hold // T7 = unaware until Master Zallow
T7 = embarrassed // T7 = ashamed // T7 = believed Shafu was good guy
Shafu may have been a slaver, but he changed his ways. At his heart he was a decent person. Master Zallow saw that, and so did you.
In the end, he was.
Nobody's perfect, Teeseven. You may have misjudged Shafu's character, but you can't beat yourself up over it.
We all make mistakes.
Jedi = wise // T7 = grateful
I can't believe you didn't realize Shafu was a slaver. Your sensors malfunctioning?
Talk about naive.
T7 = too trusting // Shafu = important lesson // T7 = more careful now
T7 = resume rebuilding report // Estimated completion = uncertain
T7 = important news // Jedi = remember Shafu?
Shafu was that Rodian slaver you told me about. The one who changed his ways and started working for Master Zallow.
Jedi = good memory // Shafu = disappeared after Master Zallow
T7 = curious // T7 = researching Shafu // T7 = discovered what happened
Don't keep me in suspense.
What did you find?
Shafu = working for Master Zallow // Shafu = sent on secret mission
If Shafu was still alive, I'm sure he would have tried to contact you.
Let me guess: he's dead.
Jedi = correct // Master Zallow = sent Shafu on secret mission // Shafu = gave his life for Republic
We're trying to save the galaxy. You can't waste time looking up old friends.
We don't have time for this!
Shafu = more than friend // Shafu = working for Master Zallow // Shafu = important work
Master Zallow = suspected Imperial spies in Council // Master Zallow = sent Shafu to investigate
Records = confirm Shafu's ship exploded over Nar Shaddaa // Death = ruled accidental // Shafu = filed one report before accident
Did Shafu discover anything to confirm Master Zallow's suspicions?
What was in the report?
Sounds like he was on to something... and someone killed him for it.
His death was no accident.
Jedi = wise // Shafu's report = contain valuable information // Imperial spies = still active in Council
You're talking about stuff that happened over twenty years ago.
This is ancient history.
Shafu's report = still relevant // Imperial spies = still active in Council
Shafu = sent report to Master Zallow // Master Zallow = never saw it // Report = deleted from official communications
T7 = trying to rebuild report from deleted files // Rebuild = complicated process // Estimated completion = unknown
That report could be crucial to the Republic war effort. Let me know as soon as you piece it back together.
Keep working at it.
Rebuilding an encrypted file from deleted bits of data? I'm not sure even you can pull that one off.
Good luck. You'll need it.
T7 = alert Jedi when finished
This side project of yours better not get in the way. Understood?
Stay focused on our mission.
T7 = understands // Rebuilding report = secondary priority // T7 = alert Jedi when finished
T7 = happy working with Jedi // T7 + Jedi = unstoppable team
Evil doesn't stand a chance with the two of us around.
You got that right.
Jedi = appreciates T7 // Others = underestimate T7 // Shafu = underestimated T7
We're good, but unstoppable might be taking it too far.
Don't get overconfident.
Try to keep some perspective. I'm a Jedi. You're just a droid who helps me out.
I'm unstoppable. Not you.
Jedi = underestimating T7 // Shafu = underestimated T7 too
Who's Shafu?
Shafu?
Shafu = Rodian slave trader // Master Zallow + T7 = put him out of business
I hope he went to prison for a long, long time.
Good. Slavers disgust me.
Shafu = not in prison // Master Zallow = convinced Shafu slaving is wrong
I don't imagine he just decided to retire because you asked nicely.
How did you do that?
T7 = infiltrated Shafu's vessel // T7 = transmitted coordinates to Master Zallow
Master Zallow = boarded ship // Shafu = caught red-handed // Master Zallow = convinced Shafu slaving is wrong
"Put him out of business" is a euphemism, right? You killed him.
So he's dead?
Shafu = not killed // Master Zallow = convinced Shafu slaving is wrong
Shafu = released all slaves on ship // Shafu = changed his ways
Don't be naive. As soon as Master Zallow was gone, Shafu went back to his slaving ways.
No he didn't. He tricked you.
Shafu = sincere change of heart // Shafu = turned undercover agent for Jedi
Did Master Zallow threaten him? Or did he use Force persuasion?
How did he convince him?
Master Zallow = used logic and reason // Shafu = realized error of his ways // Shafu = turned undercover agent for Jedi
Scum like that? I would have executed him on the spot.
He should have killed him.
Master Zallow = wise to let Shafu live // Shafu = useful resource // Shafu = turned undercover agent for Jedi
Shafu = returned to Hutt space // Shafu = freed hundreds of slaves
Shafu = disappeared after Master Zallow died // T7 = hopes Shafu okay
He probably decided to lay low after Master Zallow was killed. Get out of the game before his cover was blown.
I'm sure he's fine.
Jedi = probably right // T7 = reassured // T7 = ready to continue missions
Do you think Shafu had anything to do with Master Zallow's death?
Maybe he betrayed you.
Master Zallow = killed by Darth Malgus // Shafu = not involved // T7 = positive
T7 = wasted too much time // Galaxy = needs protection
Someone probably blew his cover. Slavers don't like people interfering with their business.
He's probably dead.
Jedi = probably right // T7 = sad // T7 = focus on something else
T7 + Jedi = get back to saving galaxy
Is there something you need to tell me?
T7 = likes helping Jedi // T7 = happiest in 100 years
I like my crew to be happy.
Good to hear.
T7 = many partners // Jedi partners = best
How old are you?
A hundred years?
T7 = built 150 years ago // T7 = originally standard factory specs // T7 = many upgrades over the years
Most droids = regular memory wipes // T7 = never full memory wipe // T7 = remembers all partners
I'm starting to see why you're so useful, Teeseven.
You've had lots of experience.
T7 = likes helping Jedi // T7 = helped other Jedi in past
So just how many partners have you had?
You remember them all?
T7 = 12 other partners// T7 + doctor // T7 + mechanic // T7 + Senator's aide // T7 + others
Maybe a good memory wipe would bring you into line.
No wonder you're so insolent.
Memory wipe = lose all special skills // T7 = need skills to help Jedi // T7 = worked with other Jedi in past
I'm not here to make you happy. I just need you to do your job.
I don't really care.
Jedi = count on T7 // T7 = helped other Jedi in past
T7 = worked with Jedi Master Ven Zallow decades ago // Master Zallow = died during Battle of Coruscant
Jedi Master Zallow = killed by Darth Malgus in Jedi Temple
It's always hard to lose someone.
I'm sorry.
Master Zallow = good friend // T7 = misses him
Why didn't the Sith destroy you when they killed Master Zallow?
How did you get away?
Master Zallow = ordered T7 to hide // T7 = record attack // T7 = witnessed Master Zallow die
T7 = escaped // T7 = reported attack to Jedi Council // T7 = work for Council ever since
Master Zallow wasn't strong enough to defeat the enemy. I am.
He must have been weak.
Jedi = be careful // Master Zallow = not weak // Darth Malgus = dangerous enemy
Darth Malgus = bad man // T7 = hopes somebody stops him
If you're looking for a hero, look no further.
I can stop him.
Do you even know where to find him?
Where is he?
Darth Malgus = location unknown
I don't have time to go chasing after this guy.
We have other priorities.
Jedi + T7 = heroes saving the galaxy // Jedi + T7 = no time to find him
Darth Malgus = bad man // T7 = happy Jedi beat him
Galaxy = needs T7 + Jedi // T7 = ready for next mission
T7 + Jedi = talk back on ship
T7 = information to share // Jedi + T7 = talk somewhere private
T7 = nothing to report at this time
Galaxy = dangerous place // T7 = glad to have partner
T7 = scanning area // area = safe for travel
T7 + Jedi = ready for adventure
T7 = entering sleep mode
Objective = not reached // Jedi = not feeling well?
T7 = practicing marksmanship // Jedi = will be impressed
T7 = part of Jedi Order // T7 = wants lightsaber upgrade
T7 + Jedi = cannot camp here // T7 = needs recharge outlet
T7 = not programmed for entertainment
T7 + Jedi = exciting life // T7 = should publish memory banks
Jedi = senses something // T7 = locking servos
Jedi = free to continue // T7 = all-terrain model
T7 + Jedi = third near-collision // T7 = apologizes
T7 + Jedi = no time to rest
Jedi = needs recharging // T7 = recommends adrenal
